idea-plugin.name: Solarized Theme
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.5

  • Compatibility with 2022.x

1.4

  • Fixed checkbox bg color

1.3.1

  • Minor update to plugin metadata

1.3

  • Increased tree foreground contrast and decreased selection background contrast

1.2

  • Fixed Kotlin smart cast background

1.1

  • Fixed parameter tip background color

1.0

  • Fixed application border color in Linux
idea-plugin.description:
The Solarized theme, adapted for JetBrains by Subtheme. Both dark and light themes are included.

Search for Subtheme to find more themes, including Atom One, Monokai Pro, and Foundation.

Contributions are welcome with GitHub. Screenshots were taken with Atom Material Icons and Operator Mono.
